title: Bug 7945: Search results not selected in external jar
description: Bug 7945: Search results are not selected in an external jar. Build 200201151. When searching for references to this field, the search results are not being highlighted.
OB: When searching for references to this field in the external jar, the search results are not being highlighted.
EB: You should see 3 matches in the method getTempDir() and the search results should be highlighted.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the external jar in the code editor
2. Search for references to the specific field
3. Verify that the search results are not highlighted
